item.title: Blog for Free Using Your Own Domain
item.description: This guide is for those who have their own domain. If you don’t have one follow [Start a Free Blog Using yourblog.github.io] THIS IS A DRAFT Prerequisites Github Account Git 2.8 Install Hugo Your own domain. ( You can buy one at Namecheap ) Point your DNS server to Github Pages Go to your DNS server page (e.g. Namecheap) Add the following records: A record for @ pointing to 185.
